revised_title: Investigating Antelope as a Reservoir for the Virus of Sleeping Sickness
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to determine if antelope can act as a reservoir for the virus of sleeping sickness (Trypanosoma gambiense). They found that antelope can be infected by laboratory-bred and infected Glossina palpalis, but they do not transmit the infection to other susceptible animals effectively. This suggests that antelope may not be a significant reservoir for the virus.
